basic.floral_language:
Lilium spp. 
Floriography: pure, elegant, self-improvement 
Lily flowers are known as "cloud fairy, is the city flower of Huzhou. Stem and leaves are beautiful, flowers bloom like a lotus. It has faint fragrance, and is got the favor of women. The lily flower, such as its meaning, a symbol of “eternal love”, has been the first choice of flowers for the wedding. 
Lily is a perennial, and likes sunshine. Under normal circumstances it can bloom every year, flowering 2-3 weeks at a time
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon
maintenance.watering: Keep soil dry rather than flooded, water thoroughly when soil is dry, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
